TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataContractJsonSerializer extends System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer
Public NotInheritable Class DataContractJsonSerializer Inherits XmlObjectSerializer

summary.span: 將物件序列化為 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 以及將 JSON 資料還原序列化為物件。

span.span: Serializes objects to the JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) and deserializes JSON data to objects.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別將型別的執行個體序列化為 JSON 文件，以及將 JSON 文件還原序列化為型別的執行個體。Use the class to serialize instances of a type into a JSON document and to deserialize a JSON document into an instance of a type. 例如，您可以使用包含基本資料的屬性 (例如姓名和地址) 來建立名為 `Person` 的型別。For example, you can create a type named `Person` with properties that contain essential data, such as a name and address. 然後您可以建立及操作 `Person` 類別的執行個體，並將所有的屬性值寫入 JSON 文件中以供日後擷取。You can then create and manipulate an instance of the `Person` class and write all of its property values in a JSON document for later retrieval. JSON 文件可以在日後使用對等的資料合約還原序列化為 `Person` 類別或其他類別。This JSON document can later be deserialized into the `Person` class or another class with an equivalent data contract. 如果在伺服器的傳出回覆序列化期間發生錯誤，或是因為某些原因導致回覆作業擲回例外狀況，該錯誤可能不會被當成錯誤傳回用戶端。If an error occurs during the serialization of an outgoing reply on the server or the reply operation throws an exception for some other reason, it may not get returned to the client as a fault.

exception.span: 正在序列化或還原序列化的至少其中一個型別不符合資料合約規則。

span.span: At least one of the types being serialized or deserialized does not conform to data contract rules.

exception.span: 例如， 屬性尚未套用至此型別。

span.span: For example, the attribute has not been applied to the type.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得指定 執行個體目前使用的 Surrogate 型別。

span.span: Gets a surrogate type that is currently active for a given instance.

summary.span: Surrogate 可以擴充序列化或還原序列化程序。

span.span: Surrogates can extend the serialization or deserialization process.
An implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用於自訂如何序列化及還原序列化某型別的執行個體。The can be used to customize how instances of a type are serialized and deserialized. 例如，它可用於序列化不能序列化的舊版型別 (也就是尚未套用 屬性的型別)。For example, it can be used to enable serialization of legacy types that are not serializable, that is, types to which the attribute has not been applied.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指定還原序列化時是否忽略未知資料，以及序列化時是否忽略 介面。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether unknown data is ignored on deserialization and whether the interface is ignored on serialization.

value.span: 如果要忽略未知資料和 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to ignore unknown data and ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性 (Property) 會影響 屬性 (Attribute) 所套用以及同時實作 介面的型別。The property affects types to which a attribute has been applied and that also implement the interface. 在 為 `true` 的情況下，會在讀取及寫入時忽略新增至合約未來版本中的資料。In this case when is `true`, data added in future versions of the contract is ignored on read and write. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[向前相容資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/forward-compatible-data-contracts.md)。For more information, see [Forward-Compatible Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/forward-compatible-data-contracts.md).

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指定序列化程式是否能夠讀取該物件。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the serializer can read the object.

param.span: 用來讀取從 JSON 對應之 XML 資料流的 。

span.span: The used to read the XML stream mapped from JSON.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指定 是否位於表示序列化程式能夠還原序列化之物件的 XML 項目上。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the is positioned over an XML element that represents an object the serializer can deserialize from.

returns.span: 如果讀取器位於正確位置則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the reader is positioned correctly; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會判斷它是否可以藉由檢查是否位於 XML 項目上來讀取物件。The determines whether it can read a object by checking that it is positioned on an XML element. 它也會檢查讀取器所在之 XML 項目的名稱和命名空間，並比較值與預期的名稱和命名空間。It also examines the name and namespace of the XML element that the reader is positioned at and compares the values to the expected name and namespace. 可以使用傳遞至建構函式的 `rootName` 值來設定預期名稱 (如果有的話)，或者為 "root" (如果沒有的話)。The expected name can be set with the `rootName` value passed into the constructor (if present), or is "root" if absent. 預期命名空間為空字串。The expected namespace is the empty string. 請注意，這個方法適用於使用從 JSON 對應之 XML 的進階案例。Note that this method is intended for advanced scenarios when working with XML mapped from JSON.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsStartObject (System.Xml.XmlReader reader);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsStartObject(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsStartObject (reader As XmlReader) As Boolean
public: override bool IsStartObject(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ reader);
override this.IsStartObject : System.Xml.XmlReader -> bool

param.name: reader
param.span: 用來讀取 XML 資料流的 。

span.span: The used to read the XML stream.

summary.span: 判斷 是否置於可還原序列化的物件上。

span.span: Determines whether the is positioned on an object that can be deserialized.

returns.span: 如果讀取器位於正確位置則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the reader is positioned correctly; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會檢查讀取器是否置於可還原序列化的項目上，如果是則傳回 `true`。This method checks whether the reader is positioned on an element that can be deserialized, and returns `true` if it is. 為了傳回 `true`，此時找到的項目必須具有預期的名稱。To return `true`, the found element must have the expected name.

summary.span: 取得物件圖形中序列化程式在一次讀取或寫入呼叫中，序列化或還原序列化的最大項目數。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of items in an object graph that the serializer serializes or deserializes in one read or write call.

value.span: 要序列化或還原序列化的最大項目數。

span.span: The maximum number of items to serialize or deserialize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用建構函式來設定。This property can be set using a constructor. 如需清單，請參閱 。For a list, see . 屬性會指定序列化程式在單一 或 方法呼叫中，序列化或還原序列化的最大物件數。The property specifies the maximum number of objects that the serializer serializes or deserializes in a single or method call. 此方法一定會讀取一個根物件，但是這個物件可能會在其資料成員中又有其他物件。The method always reads one root object, but this object may have other objects in its data members. 這些物件可能又會有其他物件)。Those objects may have other objects. 預設為 。The default is . 請注意，當序列化或還原序列化陣列時，每個陣列項目都視為個別物件。Note that when serializing or deserializing arrays, every array entry counts as a separate object. 另外請注意，有些物件可能有大量記憶體表示，因此只有這個配額可能不足以防止阻絕服務攻擊。Also, note that some objects may have a large memory representation, so this quota alone may not be sufficient to prevent Denial of Service attacks. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data.md)。For more information, see [Security Considerations for Data](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data.md). 如果您需要將這個配額增加超過其預設值，您就必須在傳送端 (進行序列化) 和接收端 (進行還原序列化) 同時執行這項操作。If you need to increase this quota beyond its default value, it is important to do so both on the sending (serializing) and receiving (deserializing) sides. 這個做法在讀取和寫入資料時均適用。It applies both when reading and writing data.

exception.span: 超過最大值的項目數。

span.span: The number of items exceeds the maximum value.
